sn_bom_service_definition.description:
A high-priority activity triggered by an internal or external request to verify the regulatory adherence of a specific home loan file or portfolio segment. This process immediately initiates a Formal Compliance Review, requiring the meticulous collection and examination of all relevant documentation, including initial disclosures, appraisals, and closing documents.
The activity's core purpose is to establish a clear, defensible audit trail, confirm adherence to federal and state lending regulations (e.g., TILA, RESPA, ECOA), and ensure all lending practices meet organizational compliance standards to mitigate potential legal and financial risk.
sn_bom_service_definition.name: Compliance request for a home loan application
